announcement.info: [Tutorial]Tutorial attendance is mandatory. Please arrive to tutorials on time. If you are more than 3 minutes late, you will be marked absent.
[Tutorial]Please go to discussion orientation before coming to tutorials. We do not have time to both review the material and talk about problem solving methods in 25 minutes.
[CSM]To be excused from section, you must email both me and mentors@berkeley.edu 24 hours prior to section.
[CSM]There wil be no section next week due to Thanksgiving break.
You can find out more about me here.
